p: The value of mating parameters, sperm concentration, NOS and SOD activities, and MDA level were presented as mean ± SEM. ICP, MAP, and testosterone levels were presented as mean ± SD. Data were analysed using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Dunn's post-hoc Multiple Comparison Test (Graph Pad Prism 7.4, GraphPad Software, San Diego, USA). P values of less than 0.05 were regarded as statistically significant.
